sys_rest_message.description:
Everything related to a project
This REST Message contains the following HTTP Methods: - GET Project (Fetch project) - PUT Project (Update project) - DELETE Project (Delete project) - GET Backup Project (Backup a project) - GET Project Roles (Fetch permissions of the current user for project) - GET Project Events (Get Events related to this project) - GET Project Users (Get users linked to project) - POST Project User (Link user to project) - DELETE Project User (Removes user from project) - GET Project Integrations (get all integrations) - POST Project Integration (create a new integration) - PUT Project Integration (Update Integration) - DELETE Project Integration (Remove integration) - POST Project Integration Value (Add Integration Extracted Value) - POST Project Integration Matcher (Add Integration Matcher) - GET Prject Keys (Get access keys linked to project) - POST Project Key (Add access key) - PUT Project Key (Updates access key) - DELETE Project Key (Removes access key) - GET Project Repositories (Get repositories) - POST Project Repository (Add repository) - PUT Project Repository (Updates repository) - DELETE Project Repository (Removes repository) - GET Project Inventory (Get inventory) - POST Project Inventory (create inventory) - PUT Project Inventory (Updates inventory) - DELETE Project Inventory (Removes inventory) - GET Project Environment (Get environment) - POST Project Environment (Add environment) - PUT Project Environment (Update environment) - DELETE Project Environment (Removes environment) - GET Project Templates (Get templates) - POST Project Template (create template) - GET Project Template (Get template) - PUT Project Template (Updates template) - DELETE Project Template (Removes template) - GET Project Views (Get views) - POST Project View (create view) - GET Project View (Get view) - PUT Project View (Updates view) - DELETE Project View (Removes view) - GET Project Tasks (Get Tasks related to current project) - POST Project Task Start (Starts a job) - GET Project Last Tasks (Get last 200 Tasks related to current project) - POST Project Task Stop (Stop a job) - GET Project Task (Get a single task) - DELETE Project Task (Deletes task (including output)) - GET Project Task Output (Get task output)
sys_rest_message.name: Semaphore UI Project
